info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Transylvania, east central Jackson, northwestern Greenville and north central Pickens Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Brevard, or near Rosman, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rosman, Caesars Head State Park, Table Rock State Park, Gorges State Park, Jocassee Gorges, Balsam Grove, Wolf Mountain, Connestee, Sassafras Mountain and Rocky Bottom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
